name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Harold X. SMITH, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Harold X. SMITH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted, 271 Pa.Super. 591, 419 A.2d 184 (1979).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Mark I. Bernstein (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Jane Cutler Greenspan, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
456 A.2d 147
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Harold X. SMITH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 28, 1983.
Decided Feb. 4, 1983.
Mark I. Bernstein (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Jane Cutler Greenspan, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
